name: Psycho Fear
storyline:
strangers awaken to find themselves trapped in the eerie confines of an abandoned psychiatric hospital after being abducted by a mysterious religious group known as The Order of Serenity.
This fanatical sect believes that guiding their victims through a series of sacred rituals will cleanse their karma and bring them closer to inner peace and enlightenment.

With no memory of how they got there, the three individuals must work together to navigate the maze-like halls and dark corners of the forsaken asylum while attempting to endure the harrowing rituals imposed by The Order of Serenity.

The group manipulates the environment and exploits their victims' weaknesses, forcing them to confront their deepest fears and make difficult choices in the name of spiritual transformation.
summary: Psycho Fear is a heart-pounding co-op survival-horror experience where players must escape to survive. Solve challenging puzzles, overcome deadly obstacles, and fight deadly enemies in an intense atmosphere, nerve-wracking and dark environment will keep players on edge.
